name: The church my mother took me to
name_original: The church my mother took me to
description:
The Church My Mother Took Me To

Toby Welsh

Mouse to look around and space to stand up (these are the only controls)

The Church My Mother Took Me To is a game about what I remember of church from back when I was a little kid. I do not believe church is a bad thing but I am not sure I understood it well enough to appreciate it. I think I would appreciate church a bit more now than when I was a kid. I have a better idea of what church is about and why people go now then when I was a kid, hopefully this helps you to understand how I felt as a child who had never been to church.

please note that this was my first time going to church.

It was the intention to have this experience end after an hour much like church did but I have not included this
